StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SelectDocument]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Sec.onItemId uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT si.[Sec.onId], si.[FriendlyName], si.[Sec.onItemType], d.[Sec.onItemId], d.[DocumentType], d.[FileExtension], d.[Data] FROM [ACP].[Document] d INNER JOIN [ACP].[Sec.onItem] si ON si.[Sec.onItemId] = d.[Sec.onItemId] WHERE d.[Sec.onItemId] = @Sec.onItemId
